name: Momoko Okazaki
description: {{nihongo|'''Momoko Okazaki'''|岡崎 百々子|Okazaki Momoko|born March 3, 2003}}, known by her [[stage name]] '''Momometal''',  is a Japanese singer and dancer. She is best known as a member of [[kawaii metal]] band [[Babymetal]], which she joined as a touring member in 2019 before becoming an official member in 2023. She was previously a member of the girl group [[Sakura Gakuin]] and is represented by the talent agency [[Amuse Inc.]]
